title: All 32 - Denver Broncos: Drew Lock has a chance to make John Elway look good again with Zac Stevens (Football 6/25)
description:
Following a few lost seasons, the Broncos have hope again. Zac Stevens of DNVR Sports offers an optimistic viewpoint of the organization on the latest edition of 'All 32' with host, Will Brinson. They discuss Drew Lock entering his second season (2:00), the weapons around him and a still steady defense (13:15). How likely are the playoffs in 2020 (18:30)? Has the team found another franchise QB? Listen to find out!
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ZacStevensDNVR
